page.title: 07RECREATION SPORTS
page.content: {SHOTTS BON ACCORD}is the local junior football team which also runs a social club.It won the Scottish Junior Cup in 1958.Some of the social clubs run amateur football teams,which may participate in the 'club' league. A number of teams for the younger enthusiasts are run by organisations and schools.The football pitches are mostly owned by the local council. In winter they are often very muddy. The swimming baths ,though rather out of date is popular with the younger people. {Shotts golf club}has a full and enthusiastic membership.The course is exposed,and is often windy. {Darts}is a regular activity in clubs. Most clubs have{pool}tables.{Snooker} is also played though facilities are scarce.Outdoor{bowls}is mainly for the mature.{Tennis}is no longer available.
